FirstPatr.name: Hello ! I'm Abdullah Atef
FirstPatr.dec: I am Abdallah, a passionate software engineer specializing in full-stack development. With expertise in both frontend and backend technologies, I create robust, scalable, and user-friendly applications. I enjoy solving complex problems and continuously learning new technologies to stay at the forefront of software development. My goal is to write clean, efficient code and contribute to meaningful projects that make a difference.
FirstPatr.Ui/Ux dec: I design responsive and modern user interfaces that provide a smooth user experience across all devices.
FirstPatr.Performance Optimization dec: I build fast and optimized websites using best practices like lazy loading, caching, and image optimization.
FirstPatr.Clean & Reusable Code dec: I write clean, reusable, and well-structured code using React, Tailwind CSS, and modern development tools.

workSection.title: How do I turn ideas into real products?

product.title: Product-Led Mindset
product.description: I focus on solving real user problems with experiences that feel intentional and effortless.

fullStack.title: Full-Stack Flexibility
fullStack.description: I bridge the gap between design and engineering to deliver cohesive, end-to-end solutions.

collaboration.title: Growth & Collaboration
collaboration.description: I build strong partnerships with teams and clients to keep projects aligned with their goals.

foundation.title: Foundations & Exploration
foundation.description: I launched my coding journey by experimenting with small web ideas and refining core skills.

expansion.title: Project Expansion
expansion.description: I delivered full-stack client work while mastering Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and modern workflows.

present.title: Advancing Craft
present.description: I focus on performance, product impact, and guiding teams toward meaningful shipping.

hero.title: Projects I’ve delivered with care
hero.description: From full-stack platforms to immersive interfaces, here’s a look at the products I loved building with amazing collaborators.

hero.title: Tell me about your next big idea
hero.description: Share details about your project, goals, or challenges. I’ll get back to you with next steps and how we can collaborate.

form.name: Full name
form.messagePlaceholder: Share anything about scope, timeline, or expectations.
form.helper: I aim to reply within 24 hours on business days.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Quick answers to the topics that usually pop up before we start working together.

projectScope.question: What kind of projects do you usually take on?
projectScope.answer: I focus on web experiences—landing pages, dashboards, full-stack web apps, and design-to-code conversions. If it’s about crafting a polished digital product, I’m in.

timeline.question: How soon can you start and how long do projects take?
timeline.answer: Availability depends on my current pipeline, but I usually start within one to two weeks. Smaller engagements can wrap in days, while larger builds may take several weeks.

collaboration.question: How do we collaborate during the project?
collaboration.answer: We’ll define milestones, communicate through your preferred tools, and share progress updates frequently. I’m comfortable joining your existing workflow or recommending one.

toast.success: Thanks! Your message is on its way.
toast.error: Hmm, something went wrong. Please try again.

review1.name: Ahmed Mohamed
review1.text: Abdallah delivered exceptional quality. His attention to detail and design sense elevated my app’s user experience beyond expectations!

review2.name: Sarah Johnson
review2.text: Super reliable and professional! Communication was clear, deadlines were met, and the final product looked stunning.

review3.name: Mohamed Hassan
review3.text: Working with Abdallah was a pleasure. His code is clean, efficient, and easy to maintain. Highly recommend him for any web project.

review4.name: Ahmed Ali
review4.text: My request was to modify, upload, and organize my website. The project was completed.Abdullah, thank God, is professional in his work and knows how to use websites and programming. He completed my request in record time.Prompt and respectful communication. I highly recommend him based on my experience.Thank you, Abdullah. We will work together again, God willing.

connects.title: Let's Connect &
connects.description: I'm always looking for opportunities to collaborate, learn, and create. Whether you have a project in mind or just want to connect, I'd love to hear from you!
